sentences.sentence: The barbed wire had left only the tiniest nick just below my right eye.
sentences.translation: 这带刺的铁丝在我右眼正下方只留下了极小的划痕。

sentences.sentence: Zanco, an American tech company, made the tiniest phone in the world—the Tiny 11.
sentences.translation: 美国科技公司 Zanco 制造了世界上最小的手机——the Tiny 11。

sentences.sentence: To see the tiniest green hummingbird in the world?
sentences.translation: 去看世界上最小的绿色蜂鸟？
